blogPost.title: It is hard to overstate the sense of bitterness and grievance in Paris after the American-Australian deal was made https://t.co/G2LaBaPZlP
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: アメリカとオーストラリアの協定が結ばれた後、パリでは苦々しい思いや不満が渦巻いていたと言っても過言ではない。https://t.co/G2LaBaPZlP
在美澳协议达成后，巴黎的痛苦和怨恨之情怎么说都不过分https://t.co/G2LaBaPZlP。

previous.title: Angela Merkel will be a pretty tough act to follow. She has been a rock through the pandemic and four terms of economic and political crises #BTW21 https://t.co/eSlzpWinwp
